channel.title: Will Some one Make me a code so like when u mass click it says something?

it saids something and if u do it to much it bans u?
i would love it and will be glad to return the favor if i can

item.title: Will Some one Make me a code so like when u mass click it says something?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (actionAmount > 25) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" is massing!"); sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; }

0 errors … i just did it

Read full topic

item.title: Will Some one Make me a code so like when u mass click it says something?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

into if (actionAmount > 25) { sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; }

so it would look like

if (actionAmount > 25) { sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" is massing!"); disconnected = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Will Some one Make me a code so like when u mass click it says something?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

try going in your client and searching for

if (actionAmount

it’ll look something like if (actionAmount > 25) { sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; }

if you have that you can change it to do something different
